Description.Text: Location This hotel is located in a picturesque forest meadow near the gateway to Kiev, towards Kharkiv. It lies around 20 km from the tourist centre of Khreschatyk and approximately 130 km from Dnepropetrovsk. Thanks to the convenient location of the hotel, guests will find the city centre (some 15 km) and the railway terminal or Boryspil Airport (35 km) within easy reach. Facilities The hotel was built in 2008. Travellers can feel at home in one of the 58 rooms. These are located in the main building (4 storeys) or in one of the 11 adjacent buildings (up to 2 storeys). Individual storeys are accessible via the lift or stairs. Services such as a cloakroom and a safe ensure a comfortable stay. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Among the culinary options available at the establishment are a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Children can have a great time playing in the playground. Additional facilities at the accommodation include a newspaper stand. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Available services and facilities include translation services, room service and a laundry service. Lectures, presentations or meetings can be held in one of the 3 conference rooms. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. There is also a minibar. Guests will also find a mini fridge included as standard. Other features include internet access, a telephone and a TV. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. A hairdryer is also available. The establishment offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment A range of sport and leisure opportunities ensure an interesting stay. The terrace is a great place to while away the time. A range of options are available, including billiards and a sauna. Additional services include an entertainment programme for children, offering numerous activities. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the accommodation: VISA and MasterCard.
